name: Police Chase Monster Truck Car Off-Road Drag Race Game Free (3D Real Test Driving Traffic Sim)
name_original: Police Chase Monster Truck Car Off-Road Drag Race Game Free (3D Real Test Driving Traffic Sim)
description:
Ready for this challenge? Hunt down these fleeing race cars from the police. You can stop crime help by using these beastly police monster trucks to chase down these racers!

OBJECTIVES:
-Collect the special coins to unlock new cool police monster trucks!
-Dodge road blocks in pursuit of the enemy!
-Beat your friends with Game Center capabilities!

Grab this cool new game while it's free!
